The header bytes.

member.summary: Loads the mod manifest from the byte array which is prefixed with a header.

member.returns: The mod manifest XML document.

The asset bytes.
The header bytes.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.AssetHeaders.SaveManifest(System.Xml.Linq.XDocument)
member.summary: Saves the mod manifest XML to a byte array prefixed with a header.
member.param: The XML representing the mod manifest to be saved.
member.returns: A byte array representing the mod manifest, prefixed with a header.

member.name: T:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader
member.summary: A class for reading and writing header information in mod files.

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.Default
member.summary: The default mod header, typically used for mods that have no header information (legacy mod support).

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader._HeaderTagV1
member.summary: The header tag (version 1). This is the first set of bytes of a mod file that identifies it as a mod file and provides the format version.

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader._HeaderTagV1Buffer
member.summary: The temporary reusable (and not thread safe) buffer used to read the header tag from files (version 1).

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader._HeaderTagV1Bytes
member.summary: The byte representation of the header tag (version 1).

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader._LongBuffer1
member.summary: A temporary resusable (and not thread safe) buffer used for reading/writing long data.

member.name: F:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader._LongBuffer2
member.summary: A second temporary resusable (and not thread safe) buffer used for reading/writing long data.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes static members of the class.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.#ctor(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Int64})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The asset bundle offset for Windows or null if it is not supported.
The asset bundle offset for MacOS or null if it is not supported.
The asset bundle offset for Linux or null if it is not supported.
The asset bundle offset for Android or null if it is not supported.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.#ctor(System.IO.FileInfo,System.IO.FileInfo,System.IO.FileInfo,System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The Windows asset bundle file info or null if it is not supported.
The MacOS asset bundle file info or null if it is not supported.
The Linux asset bundle file info or null if it is not supported.
The Android asset bundle file info or null if it is not supported.

member.name: P:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.AssetBundleOffsetAndroid
member.summary: Gets the asset bundle offset for Android. This is the byte offset in the mod file at which the Android asset bundle can be found. If this is null, the mod file does not support the Android platform.
member.value: The asset bundle offset for Android.

member.name: P:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.AssetBundleOffsetLinux
member.summary: Gets the asset bundle offset for Linux. This is the byte offset in the mod file at which the Linux asset bundle can be found. If this is null, the mod file does not support the Linux platform.
member.value: The asset bundle offset for Linux.

member.name: P:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.AssetBundleOffsetMacOS
member.summary: Gets the asset bundle offset for MacOS. This is the byte offset in the mod file at which the MacOS asset bundle can be found. If this is null, the mod file does not support the MacOS platform.
member.value: The asset bundle offset for MacOS.

member.name: P:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.AssetBundleOffsetWindows
member.summary: Gets the asset bundle offset for Windows. This is the byte offset in the mod file at which the Windows asset bundle can be found. If this is null, the mod file does not support the Windows platform.
member.value: The asset bundle offset for Windows.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Reads mod header information from the specified file path.
member.param: The file path from which to read mod header information.
member.returns: The requested mod header information or null if it could not be found or read.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.Write(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the mod header information to the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to which to write the mod header information.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.ReadOffset(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads the byte offset information from the specified stream.
member.param: The stream from which to read the byte offset information.
member.returns: The requested byte offset information.
member.exception: Unable to read the platform asset bundle offset value from the file stream while reading a mod header.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Core.ModHeader.WriteOffset(System.IO.Stream,System.Nullable{System.Int64})
member.summary: Writes the asset bundle byte offset information to the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to which to write the byte offset information.
The byte offset to write.
